website_summaries.verdict: A roomy all-weather tent that's perfect for those with a lot of camping gear.
pros: Over 6 feet high in the center
Can fit multiple queen-size air mattresses inside
cons: It's difficult to get the tent to fit back into its storage bag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tent
customer_reviews.text: Though the instructions were in Spanish, which I don't speak, the tent was very easy to put up. This thing is huge and perfect. I use this at our deer camp and we fit 3 grown men with air mattresses plus all of our bags and gear very comfortably with plenty of room to spare. The addition of the Mr. Heater with the rain fly on kept us perfectly warm. Highly recommend this tent if your looking for something spacious and great quality. We also got rained on and the rainfly kept the tent completely dry. No need to look any further for another compatible tent. Get this one. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We put this up so easily we were surprised
customer_reviews.text: We put this up so easily we were surprised! The poles are nice and sturdy and the color coded poles that match with the sleeves makes it a no brainer to errect. It's a very large tent and it's defiantly rain proof! We were considering the Arizona but for about $80 difference and the dimensions were almost the same we are very happy with the Laredo. Now the extra savings can be used for screen house. It seems very well made too. We bought it late in the season so can't wait to use it more next year, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super dry.  Super low airflow
customer_reviews.text: If getting wet is your concern, look no further but it comes at the expense of airflow. The rain fly literally cocoons the tent and air does not move. With the fly off, it’s lovely. With it on in hot/humid conditions, you’re fighting to get out. Regarding space, it’s huge. Plenty of room to spread. 9 people is silly tho. I’d probably cap it at 5-6 if comfort is a consideration. Great design tho. 4poles (color coded) mage it super easy. 1person build with no issue I do wish the door zipper was rethought. Constantly gets caught. My kids had a real hard time... but they’re little (&9) and it’s camping anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent but ONLY HAS ONE DOOR
customer_reviews.text: This seems like an awesome tent... But I bought it based mostly on the advertisement that it had TWO DOORS! BUT IT ONLY HAS ONE!! I have contacted the seller as I would like to return this tent and purchase one of theirs that REALLY has TWO doors. The other reviews are great and I was really excited to get this up and go camping but I have no use for a one door tent. Would have given it 5 stars had the advertising on Amazon AND company website been correct. Will update review once all is settled.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Canopy is like tissue paper. Its shredding! Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Bought on june 1st, writing my review Sept 5. Used for backyard camping. Set it up one time in june and as far as waterproof, yes it is! Today, i tore it down to take to a campground and 3 of the 4 corners of the rain cover are frayed through and broke. I took the top tarp part off and it was like tissue paper in my hand. Just tearing like kleenex. Ugh! The rest of the tent is in fine condition but the canopy is destroyed rendering the entire tent useless. I cant afford to but a $200 tent every season. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Zwicky

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking this is the best value period.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! Go ahead and look around, you will not find anything at this price point with this quality. We went camping the other week with a "gear head" (super into camping gear) and he could not believe we got this tent at that price. The material is much better than a coleman at the same price point. The tub goes way up around the base. Super easy to set up. My 8 year old and I set it up in minutes. You can stand up in it. 2 queens fit with plenty of extra room. Just stop researching anything else and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: It is Waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a water proof family tent. Just picked this up and on the very first trip out it rained... for 3 days straight! Rain, Hail, Snow! We were directly under 3 consecutive thunderstorms! This tent did not leak a drop! No condensation, no water from the puddles on the ground. We were amazed!!! Very easy to put up and lot's of room. Very happy with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Tami rowell

customer_reviews.title: Tent is LARGE!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is HUGE!! Maybe too big for some camping spots. When I took this tent camping the tent barely fit in the allotted tent area! But it is a great tent if you have a big enough spot for it! You can totally stand up in the tent no problem. I used it for two adults and two kids, we both had full blow up mattresses and there was definitely room for another full size mattress. The tent is advertised for 8 to 9 people -- I think that would be tight, unless there were no sleeping pads or mattresses. My only complaint is that is hard to collapse back into the bag. But overall I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ripped slightly on the first use, other than that, it's a great deal. For our growing, soon-to-be large family, this thing is giant, we really like it. Just be careful when putting the tent poles in, they will definitely rip the fabric if you are not over-the-top cautious. I've put up a lot of tents in my life and never ripped the top piece where the tent poles go until I used this tent. If they could fix that I would say buy this thing without hesitations. Or just buy it anyway and put some gorilla tape on there if you do get a rip.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Used it twice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Used it twice. No heavy rain but in Florida it's only a matter of time. We have been through a light to medium shower for several hours with no issue at all. The tent sets up easy and seems to fit in the packing bag better than most tents I have had in the past. I will update the review as we use the tent more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this tent. First night out camping with the wife, 2 y/o son and dog we got rain and lots of it! The tent kept us dry with no issues. Very roomy inside and great design overall. I would also recommend buying a heavier duty tent stake as the ones included do work but be safe and spend the $20 for a solid set you will thank me and the other reviews later!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sidwar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent perfect for a large family
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic huge tent. This fit our family of 5 plus lab perfectly with room to spare for our gear. Our first trip out we put it to the extreme weather test with 60-mph winds and torrential downpour - no leaks and stayed standing. If I had to have a complaint about it, it’s that the door seems a little short and it gets very hot with the rain fly on when it’s fully sunny - but these are minor. We love being able to stand fully in the tent and all of the room without being too big. So far it seems extremely durable and would buy it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, does the job its suppose to do A+++
customer_reviews.text: Tent was awesome really enjoyed it, easy to set up, pretty sturdy, had zero problems with it. It is very spacious, we had 4 cots in there and we still had walking room. We used it in a hunting trip in West texas it would get pretty hot in the day and cold at night sometimes it would feel colder and hotter inside the tent, then the actual outside temperature. The only thing I wish it had was a bigger carrying back trying to put all that back in there was pretty difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great tent at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We just used this for a week on a camping road trip. Set it up and tore it down every day, and it was a breeze to do. Tent is HUGE inside. Had a queen size mattress inside and there would have been room for two more. We only used the tarp that came with it, and we had no issues with moisture inside. Also, there were a few rainy nights (not big thunderstorms) and it didn't leak at all. Packs up almost as compactly as it was fresh out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: madtownsarah

customer_reviews.title: You can have privacy or a breeze but not both!
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t rained while we were using it but this thing can easily fit 2 queen sized air mattresses and have space for a few kids sized beds n dogs. I’m 5’11” and can’t fully stand up straight in the tallest part, kinda have to hunch over. Easy up and down, will fit back in the bag it comes with. Wished it had a few more inside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: finklestien

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and good for rainy day and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and good for rainy day and very spacious. But when weather is hot it is a little bit bad to uncover the rain fly for ventilation. If it has windows both sides this will be perfected.
customer_reviews.author: hongyol Jung

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of Room, easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Have not used it in the rain, but it is great for me, hubby, toddler and 100lbs lab! Plus room for stuff. I cound see the lack of airflow with the top on, but hey you cannot have it all. Totally in love with it so far....if any thing changes will update SO ROOMY! People laughed on how big it was, but that is what i wanted. Very easy set up!
customer_reviews.author: Telala

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Well made! Nice size! Wish it was a little taller and it had two entrances! but, I like the fact that the tarp goes all the way to the ground. I sprayed the seams inside with sealant for safe measures even though people that have used it in the rain say it keeps the rain out!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Larado tent a couple years ago and have used it on several camping trips. We went camping back in July and ran into an issue with the small flexible segmented pole that supports the small rain visor over the door. I emailed the company from the campsite, and they had a free replacement in the mail before we were done camping. I really appreciate the customer service as we really like this tent and can now use it for several more camping trips. Thank you NTK!
customer_reviews.author: David Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome design
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material was excellent. The flaw in the design is that the windows can't be closed unless the rainfly is on. When the rainfly is on , the entire tent is enclosed except for the door. It has very little air flow and becomes very warm. On a humid stuffy night with a forecast of rain you would either have to put the rainfly on and suffer the heat or wait until it starts to rain and go out and put the fly on potentially getting yourself and everything in the tent wet in the process. Disappointed. It is easy to put up, perfect size, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frances griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Easy to set up and roomy. We have a queen and two twin blow up mattresses and could easily put three more mattresses in here. Haven't tested against water, however it is withstanding 20 mph winds. Very warm inside during the day and cool at night. Definitely recommend this for a quick setup and sturdy tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: material not so thick as others, windows have no curtains
customer_reviews.text: material not so thick as others, windows have no curtains. Material quickly torn thru the sewing. not so tough as many tents out there. I should try to find something better hopefully. Windows are good size but there is no cover or privacy unless you have your rain fly which will make it not so breathable inside. Not a very bad quality but i will try to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great Tent - we comfortably fit 4 archery hunters with all of our gear. Rained constantly for 5 days straight. Not a drop of water inside the tent. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty solid tent. Intuitive set up w/ color coded poles, tub feels thick, zippers are smooth. All in all it's what I was searching for. Hoping for years of use
customer_reviews.author: Crayola Kid

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This tent arrived when amazon said it would. We are very happy with the size and the waterproofing as of right now. I love being able to leave the fly off and stargaze. The box arrived ripped completely open but the tent was not damaged. Easy to set up and take down and fits nicely into the bag provided. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a family camping trip and I was very happy with the performance of this tent. Did not need to put a tarp over as the rain fly did a great job and with two nights of rain, not a drop of water came through. Room for three twin mattresses to both the left and right and space in the middle for changing. You can roll up the rain fly on the sides and leave it on top so you can have a breeze at night and then quickly put it back down if it starts to rain. Very happy and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a waterproof tent this is it. Super easy to setup and lots of room inside. Tent survived a couple thunderstorms and heavy rain everyday didn’t leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tent at a great value
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fantastic. I had never heard of this NTK brand prior to buying it. But it is a Brazilian company, so I figure they designed it to withstand some rain. It goes to together very easy. 5 minutes with 2 people...maybe 15 minutes by myself. It is made of quality material. Yes, the zippers for the door are a bit odd; however, all tent doors seem to be finicky. Anyways Great quality tent at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent !! Large and roomy, the tent is easy to put up, the rainfly takes a bit of time. It rained but only briefly and no leaks. We are happy with the tent and it was easily disassembled and we had no problem folding it and put back into the storage bag it came it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We can't say enough good things about this tent. Goes up easy by 2 people. Breakdown, and cleans just as easily. Slept 6 adults with maneuvering room (we used cots and air mattresses) on its maiden camp. Every bit as described; and delivered in time
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingworx

customer_reviews.title: Great tent.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. As others have mentioned, no ventilation if the rain fly is on, and no privacy with it fully off. Perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Happy WAH guy...

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tent for the price. Would probably fit 3 queen mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: ghskid06

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Huge tent. Sleeps great and even I at 6'2 can stand up in it. Very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome! Set it up for two days with rain fly to test how well it kept out the water and after 1.5+" of rain and wind over it not one drop inside. Plenty of space for people and gear. Pretty well ventilated even with the fly on. Just make sure you stake it properly and use all the ties to secure the fly to the poles. Easy to put up - maybe 5-10 mins with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent materials and build
customer_reviews.text: This is a rock solid tent! Excellent materials and build. Very easy set up. This should be an Amazon bestseller at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rosow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Just what I was looking for in ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Just what I was looking for in a tent. With the rain fly off you can see all the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: The inside was dry except where the 2 1/2 year old kept going in and out. Great tent, good ventilation. Only wish the door cover extended out a little further
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This tent is awesome! It performed like a champ in a severe ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome! It performed like a champ in a severe thunderstorm in Kansas, and I mean severe. The wind flattened our supply tent and soaked everything in it while my new NTK kept me and my kids safe and dry. I then took it to Twin Lakes, Colorado and again it down poured rain and we all stayed safe and dry. Great tent, Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and strong in the wind. Pleasantly surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This tent is huge! Very spacious and very well ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! Very spacious and very well built. Absolutely poured and not a drop of water in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAMILY CAMPING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TENT ROOMY AND LOTS OF AIR FLOW WITHOUT THE RAIN SHIELD. FYI in humidity though you'll wake up with morning dew on you :-) Hubby loves this tent, easy to set up and tear down in minuets and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: MelissaR

customer_reviews.title: H3ll of a tent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Easy to setup, roomy and it has stood the storm test multiple times. Breakdown is a breeze and the tent takes up very little space. Worth every penny. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and spacious recently had tornado level winds in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tent and spacious recently had tornado level winds in our camp ground we stay at for work and the tent poles snapped but the rent it self stayed dry inside and was still in one piece only had to replace poles which is a small fix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will survive the rain, no windows besides the one one the main door.
customer_reviews.text: Survived a thunder storm on our last camp two weeks ago. Torrential rain and strrooong wind gusts- dry inside. Just wish it had a window opening or two.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzing N. Yarphel

customer_reviews.title: a great tent with lots of room for the six of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been up for most of the summer. So far, a great tent with lots of room for the six of us.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, very roomy with plenty of hight to stand straight. Easy to set up. Great seller and quick shipper!
customer_reviews.author: AnniaR

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Love how big the tent is and the simplicity to set it up. We had a pole break and seam come undone. We sent it back and got a replacement. Love the tent! And will use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Darby Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome!! I have yet to test this out in the rain but I'll be back to comment once I do. Well made. Only thing I could say is the stakes could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Action2098

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the money. Nice and roomy and we watched the stars all night.
customer_reviews.author: Mommakitty

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent
customer_reviews.text: We seam sealed and sprayed with ScotchGuard before we took it out to camp in. Plenty of room for 2 double-stacked queen blow=up mattresses, camping gear, a 4 foot foldout table. Temperatures got down to the 50s in the evening, but no condensation because there was plenty of air flow between the tent and rain fly. Great family tent! With regular treatments, I'm sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn in Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: This tent is well made and easily pitched. I expect several years of service from ...
customer_reviews.text: After many years of camping and owning tents this was a know brainer!.This tent is well made and easily pitched. I expect several years of service from it. One of very few made with full rain fly these days.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very easy to set up. The english directions are the third ones down.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Still had good air circulation
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a two day trip at the Buffalo River in Arkansas.Two day rain total 3.5 inches,not a drop of water in the tent.Still had good air circulation.Great tent!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: and wind protection were fantastic and big enough for 5 person family
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, and wind protection were fantastic and big enough for 5 person family, dog and gear.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bosserman

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: This tent has kept me dry, and is very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything stayed dry during two days of hard rain.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent. Very roomie. I’m 6”3 and able to stand in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used it once, very big, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Robert W sentz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent. We camped out in 3 days of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. We camped out in 3 days of rain and the inside stayed perfectly dry. It is huge. We had one full and 2 twin air mattresses plus all of our gear and two bag chairs set up inside and still had room to walk around. It is easy enough for 2 people to set up, and only takes about 10 minutes once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up. Wonderful quality, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent. Best one I've ever owned. It's been through many heavy downpours along with lighter rain also with absolutely no signs of leaking anywhere. Completely dry. I do wish that the storage bag was bigger and the poles more durable however they have very good customer service and will replace the broken poles so they take care of you. We had some really strong winds the first time we used it causing one end to buckle in several times causing the pole to crack but it sprung back to normal every time so I didn't notice the crack until our second outing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flinner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a HIGH quality, weatherproof tent. reliable brand made for real camping, and the color is vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Light and rainproof but poor ventilation.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is extremely large and extremely light. It withstood a near-hurricane strength winds in Florida Keys and a heavy downpour. Why not 5 stars? it only has one door and the rainfly has no vents - it was stifling inside. We slept without the fly when it wasn't raining.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna L. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Besides the zipper getting occasionally stuck on the fabric, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent!! It fit two twin and one queen mattress with plenty of room to spare. Very easy to set up too. It poured all weekend when we were camping and the tent didn't leak one drop.
customer_reviews.author: izzy!

customer_reviews.title: Stayed dried the entire weekend. Held up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stayed dried the entire weekend. Held up to the expectations. Only wish it had more than one window when the rainfly is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would consider myself a camper and I felt this ...
customer_reviews.text: I would consider myself a camper and I felt this tent was high quality. The only negatives I found was the double zipper on the door and I felt that the tent fly had a lot of steps to it. Oh and there were no directions or picture to help put together.
customer_reviews.author: nikkiz81

customer_reviews.title: Busted pole on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, but I've only used it twice now and one of the poles busted. :/
customer_reviews.author: Laura Booth

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice size ,easy setup. Your money stops there. First camping trip out got a hole in the bottom of the tent. Second trip out the sleeve that the poles attached to ripped. Is stains very easily. You get what you pay for. Update. Customer service was awesome had a new tent in less than 2 weeks. Hopefully the first one was just a fluke
customer_reviews.author: WARNING:

customer_reviews.title: We haven't slept in the tent yet. But we ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't slept in the tent yet. But we did put it up. It appears spacious and should serve our purpose. Unfortunately, we already broke the pole for the rainfly.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality tent
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality! Broke the first time we set it up and they only have a 30 day return policy but we didn't try it until we went camping for July 4th weekend. Honestly I wouldn't buy this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tan

customer_reviews.title: nice tent but terrible design
customer_reviews.text: nice tent but terrible design, the flaps don't raise on the side for ventilation and one of our tent rods broke on the first use, customer service has been unreachable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Z.

customer_reviews.title: Need extra protection to cover complete the tentand avoid the transpiration from the cool
customer_reviews.text: For winter season it,s no ok. Waterproof 100 % i don,t think so. Need extra protection to cover complete the tentand avoid the transpiration from the cool weather
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like these tents. great for texas weather. leave the rain fly off snd it is 360 breezes!
customer_reviews.author: marci

product_meta.title: NTK Laredo GT 8 to 9 Person 10 by 15 Foot Sport Camping Tent 100% Waterproof 2500mm
feature_bullets: SPACIOUS 8 to 9 Person (aduls/kids), 1 Roomy Door, 3 Windows Tent Designed for Easy Assembly with color coded poles. Super 6.2 FT height for maximum comfort.

FULL COVERAGE RAINFLY: Double layer 190T polyester laminated with polyurethane 2500 mm water column, partially aluminium, heat-welded PU seam sealed and UV protection, Large covered mesh vents provide even more ventilation. Inner tent: Large D-style doors with mosquito mesh for great views and ventilation. Roomy utility pockets and gear loft for gear storage.
FRAME: 100% virgin NANO-FLEX shock corded fiber glass rods with improved diameter and double gold plated ferrules. Aluminium Pin-and-ring system for easy and quick setup.

MOSQUITO MESH: Inner tent fully breathable with generous Ultra-thin polyester no-see style mesh keeps you safe from smallest insects and mosquitos while offering some privacy from side view (when not using the rainfly).

FLOOR MATERIAL AND DESIGN: Heavy duty anti-fungus seamless polyethylene with inner silver coated layer keeps you dry and protected enhanced by the unique element barrier bathtub-style construction (you won't wake up in a puddle!). Security: Meets CPAI-84 flammability requirements. Heavy duty carry bag with compression straps and ID label to personalize your tent.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
